column1: ggrieved by the conviction and sentence, the Accused has filed an appeal with this Court.
he following grounds of appeal were urged by the Counsel for the Accused:

column2: That the Learned High Court Judge had failed to properly consider the delay on
the part of the PW1 to make a complainant and failure to give justifiable reason
That the Learned Trial Judge had failed to properly consider that the evidence of
the PW1 fails the test of consistency.
